contents.Text: When you select a search from one of these menus,
it should display in the "Search Result" section.
As you gather all your desired searches, click on the "Shuffle and add all" button.
This will initiate a comprehensive search of all queued entries,
merge them into a unified list, and then shuffle the results.
Upon shuffling, these searches will be added to your music player queue.
Use alt+x to toggle this feature on and off
